description:
The siren is sounded again for Antonio Brown. After constant speculationÂ about when and where the former All Pro would return to the league, we got our answer on Friday night. AB is headed to Tampa Bay for a reunion of sorts with Tom Brady. Will Brinson was able to break away from some quality family time to break down the move. Will it work? Is this the best fit for Brown? Brinson answers that and more in this emergency edition of the Pick Six podcast.Â
